column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday January 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Upcoming Road/Lane Closures for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: Monday 1/9 from 3 a.m. to 3 p.m., weather permitting, for major storm sewer repairs.

column3: Upcoming Road/Lane Closures for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: Rose St - All northbound lanes (direction from E High St to E Vine St) will be closed.

column3: Upcoming Road/Lane Closures for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: E Vine St - Only the leftmost lane will be open.
